commit.message:
[Ada] Pretty-print attribute names using mixed case

2018-05-21  Daniel Mercier  <mercier@adacore.com>

gcc/ada/

	* pprint.adb: Use mixed case for attribute names.

From-SVN: r260470

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,7 @@
+2018-04-04  Daniel Mercier  <mercier@adacore.com>
+
+	* pprint.adb: Use mixed case for attribute names.
+
